Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I thought you might be interested in an upcoming webinar on common communication issues for sales teams – and what you can do to avoid them – featuring Gerhard Gschwandtner, Founder & CEO of Selling Power and PGi's own Todd McCormick, Vice President of SMB Sales.
I invite you to learn how to:
-Ensure reps always make a great first impression with clients -Start meetings on time and without technical obstacles -Empower remote reps to collaborate with clients -Keep clients and reps engaged during online meetings
